hero.title: Affiliate Program
payments.title: Payment Models
payment.model1: Hybrid includes two types of compensation: RevShare and CPA. This approach allows partners to receive a fixed reward according to the CPA model, as well as an additional percentage of the company's profit based on RevShare.
payment.model2: CPA stands for 'Cost Per Action', within which payment is made for specific user actions. These actions may include, for example, website clicks, registrations, or making a deposit.
payment.model3: RevShare is an affiliate system model in which the webmaster receives a share of the total profits. The JetTon affiliate program provides basic conditions R/S from 50%.
payments.item1: Steady passive income - the opportunity to earn a percentage as long as the platform continues its operation.
payments.item2: Traffic sources are virtually unlimited - the key is to keep the users you've attracted playing actively.
payments.item3: Targeting can be very useful - by working on the target audience, you can increase your profit even more.
payments.item4: RevShare models offer the possibility of greater profit compared to the CPA model.
promo.title: Promo
promo.sectiontitle: Boost Earnings with Our Affiliate Program!
promo.text: The affiliate program provides a wide range of marketing tools to help you promote advertising campaigns and convert your traffic into potential customers.
provider.title: Key Providers
faq.title1: What is the JetTon Affiliate Program?
faq.title2: What traffic sources do we accept and what is prohibited?
faq.title4: Which GEOs do we accept for payment?
faq.description1: JetTon Partners is the affiliate program for the JetTon Games casino on Telegram. After registration, you can easily convert your traffic into leads.
faq.description2: We work with almost all types of traffic, except those that violate the law. It is also prohibited to use images or photos of politicians and political topics in advertising materials, motivated traffic, traffic from PTC sites, earning schemes, capper traffic, etc. We mainly operate on an R/S model. You can always find out more details from the affiliate department manager.
faq.description3: 1) Second deposit presence 100% - for app traffic (within 2 weeks) 2) Turnover requirements (transaction amounts) X3 for all RevShare without KPI KPI for Hybrid: 1) from 50 FD per day 2) Second deposit presence 100% - for app traffic (within 2 weeks) 3) Turnover requirements (transaction amounts) X3 for all
faq.description4: The GEOs of referred players are eligible for payment, and each group of countries has its own terms depending on the payment model. You can find the full list of current GEOs from our affiliate managers.
faq.description5: By using the RevShare model, you permanently receive 50% of the company's revenue from any player you have ever referred. CPA is a fixed payment for each player who performs the target action. We have set the right KPIs so that you and we can grow together.
